title.rendered: Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds on the cover of Southern Living Magazine

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Soho Boutique Fireplace Surround made the front cover of the August issue of Southern Living Magazine. The Soho was featured in Southern Living’s 2012 Idea Home. The issue reaches over 2.5 million people so grab your copy today!

excerpt.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Soho Boutique Fireplace Surround made the front cover of the August issue of Southern Living Magazine. The Soho was featured in Southern Living’s 2012 Idea Home. The issue reaches over 2.5 million people so grab your copy today!
